pdf_rand package

Submodules

pdf_rand.pdf module

Core logic for the pdf definition.

class pdf_rand.pdf.ProbabilityDensityFunction(x, y, k=3)[source]

Bases: InterpolatedUnivariateSpline

Class describing a probability density function. :param x: The array of x values to be passed to the pdf, assumed to be sorted. :type x: array-like :param y: The array of y values to be passed to the pdf. :type y: array-like :param k: The order of the splines to be created. :type k: int

prob(x1, x2)[source]

Return the probability for the random variable to be included between x1 and x2. :param x1: The left bound for the integration. :type x1: float or array-like :param x2: The right bound for the integration. :type x2: float or array-like

rnd(size=1000)[source]

Return an array of random values from the pdf. :param size: The number of random numbers to extract. :type size: int
